website_summaries.verdict: The LG G4 for T-Mobile has a removable battery and a microSD card slot, but is held back by bloatware and heating issues.
pros: Removable battery and microSD card slot

customer_reviews.title: A little hiccup but now amazingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Phone came in a good amount of time. At first there was an issue, the imei number was coming up lost or stolen when I went to activate it. I was upset I would have to get a replacement. I contacted the seller, they asked for the imei, told me it should work now and viola!! Excellent phone. Looked Flawless no signs of wear and I got it at an awesome price. These still sell in stores for over $450. Great phone and great price!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jonny AmaZ0N

customer_reviews.title: If you just need a phone
customer_reviews.text: It could have been a really nice phone.. First it's sturdy, second it's pretty fast handling commands, and third it's a nice build of android 6.0... I also bought the circle case which made it a bit nicer to handle. Now the bad.. The batter drains real fast, it takes a long time to charge, the battery gets hot fast, the camera sucks, (the camera on my LG stylo 2 plus is much better) and it's slow when playing games. Plus I heard about the bootloop problems, so be careful. It's not a bad budget if you just need a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Not New as listed
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about 7 months before the dreaded LG G4 "Bootloop" issue popped up. Found out thru my carrier that it was a refurb phone. Hopeful that LG will cover the repairs under warranty for me! I wouldn't buy from them again. Phone was listed as new, LG told me that the IMEI wasn't for the listed phone, and the LG warranty wasn't valid because the phone was altered. When I asked to return the phone thru Amazon, they wouldn't even go thru the courtesy of contacting me. I paid $270 for a brick. IB SUSPICIOUS about IB Wireless....
customer_reviews.author: Gibbo

customer_reviews.title: Still a good value.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is for TMobile USA only. Pros: Good value for money. Camera is still pretty good and audio is excellent. Still has 3.5mm jack, removable battery, IR blaster, and good display. Cons: Battery life won't make it through a whole day. Get a spare. And frustrating LG updates. The V20 is all around better phone but more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: johnp2

customer_reviews.title: 3  Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had this phone since Jan 2018 and it has lost wyfy and Blue Tooth functions. It was bought to replace a previous identical unit that died after a year. I will NOT buy this model again because of its inherent unreliability. I'm not happy with LG because of the defect. As far as delivery time, VERY HAPPY. Just not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: chris robinson

customer_reviews.title: A great smartphone at this price point
customer_reviews.text: A great smartphone at this price point. It great for texting, browsing the web, emailing, watching and streaming youtube videos like many other smartphones. I only have two negatives with this phone. I noticed it runs a little warm and the battery doesn't seem to last longer then a day or two. It's an overall good smartphone if you are looking for a inexpensive smartphone for normal everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Will J

customer_reviews.title: Never buy LG
customer_reviews.text: This phone just stopped booting. it shut off on it's own and only gets to the lg logo some of the time. This is the second LG model phone I have purchased through the years and both have had flaky issues and randomly died. I had a samsung s3 that last 3 yrs before I broke the screen on it. I buy a phone and do prepaid so no help to fix it from LG.Never buy LG.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone blew up thanks to an amazon purchased battery and charger suggested by the manufacturer and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought a suggested charger via Amazon, that proceeded to blow out the phone's brand new battery I also purchased. Apparently this is an issue with the phone that was never brought up in any Amazon reviews or questions on this phone. This is a manufacturer issue that they haven't found a fix for and Amazon should do their due diligence to ensure that their customers are getting the best products no matter what, make sure that you have the outstanding recall information and other major phone problems listed on all the phones on the website so I won't have to keep buying a new phone every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Sweet phone for the price; some hardware unreliability.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. Great price for the phone you're getting. Sadly, they overheat and die randomly. Could be 3 years, could be 11 months. I had my previous one for about 19 months before it died.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed to brick itself.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 11 months, then bricked itself. Researched online and discovered that they *ALL* do this. LG would not honor the warranty because they said the amazon seller tampered with the serial number or something. There's a class action suit against LG for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: qq

customer_reviews.title: A great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this smartphone. Even though it's an older phone, it's still one of the best phones out there. I did my sturdy on youtube and other media to find this phone has received high marks. I agree with others on this smartphone, it's worth the cheaper price for the older phone.
customer_reviews.author: tee

customer_reviews.title: Random battery drains.
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this phone on the 21st of September and since then where the phone is at 80% 40% or 20% it will proceed to shut off then when charging start from zero percent.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: After having iphone and countless other Android phones this LG G4 definitely takes the cake! The camera takes crisp clear photos and has many great features not offered on other phones I've previously owned. And the battery life is actually pretty decent for my moderate-heavy use of web browsing, texting, emails and phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: The phone seems to be working fine work no current issues. The phone came with back cover Verizon logo on it and it's a T-Mobile phone. The phone had big dent on the corner that was not disclosed in the listing. Not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Art Flores

customer_reviews.title: WATCH OUT FOR THE BOOTLOOP
customer_reviews.text: A successor to the LG G3, which was one of the best phones, this phone is amazing! However, it has the bootloop issues. Without it... I'd keep this baby for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: IDK if it was a hardware or software issue, but this thing was a piece of crap. And I really liked the phone itself and the features. But it never worked right. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I put the sim card in and the phone effortlessly hooked up to my T-Mobile account. I've been using it for about 2 weeks and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rigamer

customer_reviews.title: after 3 months of use it bricked itself
customer_reviews.text: used it for 3 months and 12 days. One day it rebooted itself and bricked. And it stuck at factory reset, so even that isn't an option. After researching online, apparently this has occurred to a lot of people. I regret buying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: REFURBISHED
customer_reviews.text: It's not new no matter what you're​ told. Mine was refurbished even though I was told it was new. It then broke ( bootloop) and was not under the warranty any more sine it was refurbished. Big waste.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wize

customer_reviews.title: LG G4 fatal loop problem
customer_reviews.text: This phone is in the fatal loop problem. I need to know what I can do about this phone.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL FRAME

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend! With a case
customer_reviews.text: Super versatile and feels new technology-wise! Love the camera, sound, and large high def screen! Would suggest a case and screen protector tho, it feels pretty fragile, but it's super lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sim card part doesn't work so I was never able to use the phone
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Already quit working!!!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 months and it already does not work! What a waste of my money. I am so disappointed. Just goes to show I should have went to my service providers store and bought one from them. Don't take chance!
customer_reviews.author: Amber C.

customer_reviews.title: G4 died
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but not even a year after purchasing it it completely died. No response from the power button. LG has had quite a few issues with these phones.
customer_reviews.author: Real Name

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a good phone but the used one I bought only 4 months ago quit working. Just died. Not sure if that's the sellers onus or not but for refurbished I expect it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: amjolu

customer_reviews.title: pixel artifact seizure episodes make this phone unusable for a couple of minutes multiple times throughout the day it's been lik
customer_reviews.text: product was shipped broken to me screen stuttering, pixel artifact seizure episodes make this phone unusable for a couple of minutes multiple times throughout the day it's been like that out of the box since before i even got my sim card in and it only has been getting worse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Que este dispositivo vino en leadher
customer_reviews.text: The device although it has many signs of use I liked it a lot because, it was supposed to be the same as the photo but this article came in the back in leadher. But where I do not like at all I buy the T-Mobile devices because they bring an App to unlock the phone and this gives me an error (I can not unlock it). I would like to see a return of the order if it applies please ..
customer_reviews.author: ricardo silvestre

customer_reviews.title: The charger isn't good. It takes about 1 day to fully charge ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all the phone was supposed to be new and it wasn't. The charger isn't good. It takes about 1 day to fully charge the phone. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Love all the features with not too much bloat and ...
customer_reviews.text: Drops calls far less frequently than the Samsungs or HTC with the same carrier and location. Love all the features with not too much bloat and shovelware.
customer_reviews.author: Blindmango

customer_reviews.title: Daughter received this today. It came as promised and ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter received this today. It came as promised and she loves it so far! Thank you. Our first experience with buying cell phone on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Right after the day i could return it, i ...
customer_reviews.text: Right after the day i could return it, i could barely make a phone call anywhere i go. No it isnt my network either. Uaed same sim on two other phones with no problems. Cheap for a reason, seller doesnt respons to you either
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Exactly what I ordered. The only difference in the plastic backing and the leather backing is that the leather backing comes with awesome earphones, the plastic backing packaging doesn't. Other than that, I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I have had nothing but problems with this phone. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but problems with this phone. I have to restart my phone at least 3x a week since it freezes. The last month my phone will not turn on unless it is being charged. I have only had this phone for about a Year or less
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Robbins

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE! There is a known ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE! There is a known problem where the phone will reboot several times and then get stuck on the LG screen. I contacted Chubbiestech (the company I bought it through) and they will not fix the issue even though I bought the phone 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was a great phone for a little over a year. It was fast, the battery lasted a good amount of time, and it had some good features. I just witnessed the infamous boot loop, so I'm going to have to get a new phone. I doubt Amazon or the tiny company I bought it from will exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This refurbished phone stopped working after a month. It won't power on. It won't reboot. We changed the battery, etc. Very disappointing. With just a 30 day guarantee, you are better off spending your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything came in perfect working condition
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in perfect working condition. Phone was very nice the way it was packaged and looked like something u buy brand new.everything was in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tmac740

customer_reviews.title: told model that will bootloop and stop working, I ...
customer_reviews.text: told model that will bootloop and stop working, I bough it march 15 2017 and g repair received it from me Feburary 17, 2017, they refused to fix it and are shipping it back to me.. DO NOT BUT
customer_reviews.author: axel

customer_reviews.title: Wrong battery
customer_reviews.text: I recieved an lg g4 with the wrong battery in it. It is very disappointing especially knowing this is a fulfillment by Amazon product
customer_reviews.author: I H

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3rd G4 i've bought with the SAME bootloop error and screentearing. Save yourself some trouble and buy another phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i not recommend to buy it not find to sell this
customer_reviews.text: i am very upset for this phone .i bough around 7 months it just get frishing i try to fixe it but not work. i not recommend to buy it not find to sell this

customer_reviews.title: ... this phone for less than a month and I loved it, the problem was that lg has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for less than a month and I loved it, the problem was that lg has a technical problem and the phone just stopped working and lock on the lg presentation screen and even if I tried all the tips I found on iternet nothing works. Then I find out than LG have some technical issue on this phone model.
customer_reviews.author: manuel c.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, excellent condition, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest deal I could find for an LG G4 (TMobile) and was in excellent condition when received, in original box. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: AndyMac3

customer_reviews.title: Absolute piece of junk! Have had several of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of junk! Have had several of these phones and each had the bootloop problem. Never buy a LG product ever again!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: I really love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone. The buttons are very ergonomic,the screen is great and the price is right.Couple and customize it with Nova Launcher and you have a phone and platform equal with any in the world. T Mobile will unlock as quickly as you can download their app.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy a refurbished LG G4
customer_reviews.text: Would not turn on or take a charge after three months of use. LG would not service. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan  Raynor

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. Most likely your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. Most likely your phone will stop working and have a boot loop issue. This is an LG problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Got stuck in a reboot program less than 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Got stuck in a reboot program less than 2 months after I bought it had to buy a new phone
customer_reviews.author: sharon g jackson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone stopped workings altogether after 5 months. Expensive Refurbised Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Niall Lennon

customer_reviews.title: I've had this phone about 6 months and out just ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone about 6 months and out just randomly shuts off. I can't even get it to turn back on now
customer_reviews.author: Salli P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its a great phone and cant go wrong for the price. Try finding a better phone for the price you cant. Its only a hair below the HTC and Samsung galaxy 7.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Defective charger.
customer_reviews.text: Charger input into the phone has to be hand held with pressure at a certain angle in order for it to remail charged. The battery life is not great, either. But, the LG G4 is a cool phone.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It stop working after the 30 day return period. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: juan grande

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item used and it stated it had some scratched. I got it, and I can barely see anything. Excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work proper sent it back no cell service or data.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone was google lock and had to pay to get it unlock
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: Good sell bad product
customer_reviews.text: Product overheats to the point of no usage. Burned my hand with its heat.
customer_reviews.author: Redguy81410

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an update of the product. I had given a five stars review. However, product failed within 4 months. Yes, 4 months. Bought it in October and by April it failed. By doing research I've read that a common problem with these phones is the issue with the boot loop, which no matter what you, it will not turn on. It gets stuck in the initial screen setup LG logo. If you plan to buy, purchase an extended warranty thru Assurion .
customer_reviews.author: Rockie

customer_reviews.title: Best deal around
customer_reviews.text: The phone, the price, and the service everything was and is perfect for now.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Show room quality.
customer_reviews.text: Brand spanking new. It's been weeks and everything works well. No a scratch or dent. Very proud of my purchase. I would make this purchase a thousand times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that the description did not mention that the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the description did not mention that the phone would come with a chipped bottom left hand corner or a weird discoloration spot on the back near the camera lens. The phone also wasn't sanitized before packaging as I wiped it down before placing it in a phone case. It is for the T-Mobile network as described. If a consumer is making the choice to buy a used product, all of it's defects should be listed.
customer_reviews.author: Mo. Fiya

customer_reviews.title: Awful product, do not recommend it. O STARS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone, from the beginning it has been nothing but problems. The battery would take forever to charge, we purchased a new battery believing this to be a defective one. Shortly thereafter we can hear persons speaking, but they do not understand us, To complicate matters, calls are dropped constantly and the screen goes dark. This is by far the worse phone we have purchased. I had written a review when the problem was just the battery, I should have given it a low score from the beginning. If I could've I would have given 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Smoke Stack

customer_reviews.title: Locked to T-Mobile and very expensive for non T-Mobile customers to unlock.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone, great camera (in low light too). But if you want to unlock it, BEWARE. T-Mobile doesn't allow non-customers who have not registered the phone with then to do so. Unlock codes for this phone can cost $60+. Yikes. Always check the unlock prices for a phone and the carrier before buying a cell if that is your aim.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less then 3 weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased phone on the 9th of Jun, yesterday phone quit working completely! No spot exchange item just return. Very disapointed in the product. *Update phone was sent to LG for the bootloop issue that caused the phone to quit working. LG said the phone is counterfeit and will not fix it! $239.00 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.Underwood

customer_reviews.title: It has a good display and all but I have 3 major gripes
customer_reviews.text: It has a good display and all but I have 3 major gripes. 1. It gets hot, REALLY hot out of nowhere. A hot phone could mean a hot motherboard which leads to other issues. 2. The battery life on this thing is REALLY POOR. After a being prompted 3. Boot looping has me scared that my phone could become a brick at any moment. Thankfully nothing has happened... yet
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY FROM THEM
customer_reviews.text: Phone went into "boot loop" eight months after purchasing. I contacted the seller to obtain the information I needed to get it repaired and they were unhelpful and told me to contact LG directly. Well the thing is I didn't buy the phone directly from LG so that doesn't work. All I needed was a form with the serial number on it that matched the phone and they wouldn't help me. Sounds like a bunch of lazy scammers to me.
customer_reviews.author: alanna

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new but received something else.
customer_reviews.text: My device was ordered from iTab LLC as new. I received a used product that had been repackaged to appear new and unopened. The S/N on the box and phone did not match. The gray back cover was replaced with a fake black plastic leather look a like. All the clear protective plastic around the phone edge had been removed and the power button/camera housing appears to have been replaced with a poor quality replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: LG G4 LTE smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift; the user says it laggy, and not great for phone connectivity where it is usually used. Also, despite being in a phone case the screen cracked when dropped. If I had to buy again, this would not be on the preferred short list.
customer_reviews.author: Hardware Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't ever buy this phone! First one died after one year. Soldering issue. This second one just now died, in the middle of driving Uber. Screen just froze up. Would not respond. Took out battery and put it back in. Won't start. Changed the battery, won't start. Just completely died all of sudden. Phone was only on for a half hour doing Uber. Was not even hot. I'm so pissed off at LG and the I'm losing right now.
customer_reviews.author: Erik LePage

customer_reviews.title: Less bulky than the new LG G5
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered from the Amazon Marketplace never showed up and I had to contact Amazon for a refund from the seller. However, I did go and buy a brand new one from T-Mobile directly and really love this phone. It has a very large screen, excellent sound, and decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFTW

customer_reviews.title: Well it did look great and work great temporarily
customer_reviews.text: Well it did look great and work great temporarily. But i found out afterwards that the lg g4 goes into a reboot cycle and wont work. Thats what happened to mine. Apperently a lawsuit for lg .Now i am out of what i payed for it and had to buy a different phone. May not be the sellers fault but i dont know if if they were aware of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Bad phone that the seller stock piled from its initial ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad phone that the seller stock piled from its initial launch. This phone is guaranteed to get a boot loop and LG won't honor the warranty because the phone has already been sitting around for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging by amazon
customer_reviews.text: Horrible packaging by amazon. No cushion around the phone. Battery did not come for not even half day. Not so responsive. lot of bloatware (LG and T-Mobile) draining battery. Can not uninstall any bloatware.I recommend buying manufacturer unlocked one. Don't buy the one locked for a carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mad. G

customer_reviews.title: He says it is a good phone, and doesn't have any complaints
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this phone so he could purchase multiple batteries for it and not have to worry about charging it as much as his samsung s6. He says it is a good phone, and doesn't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ALISA

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: well i bought this in dec 2016. it worked perfect until now. it started to freeze then randomly shutting down. not it wont even go past the logo screen. i guess you get what you paid for. a years worth of it..i really cant see paying half a grand for a damn phone. i figure used would at least get me a couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: gary patalano

customer_reviews.title: this is a pretty good phone
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this phone. The only downside so far is the battery life. Currently running Marshmallow and this appears to be a known issue. Hopefully future updates will correct this drawback. Otherwise, this is a pretty good phone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Out of the box. 2nd Died after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: One came with loose camera cover, sent it back. The next one i ordered died after 1 week of normal use..
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT D BREW

customer_reviews.title: Possible knock off?
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this phone back to the manufacturer for repair. They wouldn't repair it because it was a non LG IMEI label.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Preowned and black listed, unuseable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use the phone and bought a new SIM and couldn't get it to work, it turns out the used phone i received is black listed because who ever had it last had an over due bill so whatever i learned my lesson don't buy phones on Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: After 6 or 7 months of performing flawlessly, the ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 or 7 months of performing flawlessly, the dreaded bootloop has bricked this phone. LG in the US would not repair under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but wifi has problems ... Its not my router nor my internet service either 1/5/2017 : due to the previous owners outstanding bill, tmobile has disabled my phone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very good just gets too hot and battery drops down too fast

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I now own two, it suits my needs and is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: andrews042

customer_reviews.title: Phone was in very good condition as advertised and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in very good condition as advertised and I'm very happy with it ... AND happy with the price I paid!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Bought used, but only lasted six months before freezing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought used, but only lasted six months before freezing up. Stuck on LG power screen and can't do a factory reset.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone was all good except the battery is junk. Wouldnt buy from again

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This phone give me about a month-and-a-half before the screen stopped working. Would not recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: BootLooped
customer_reviews.text: Phone was great until it got trapped on a BootLoop 9 months in, done with LG phones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome phone - great camera - got at a great price, too
customer_reviews.author: Blaine D. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: The phone works great. But the way it was shipped could have ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great. But the way it was shipped could have been done with care. It was a miracle that the phone came in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great deal, and a good backup phone. The Lg G4 is a workhorse. Good camera also.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This LG G4 H811 4G LTE Smartphone work great! great
customer_reviews.text: This LG G4 H811 4G LTE Smartphone work great! great!!!, more signal than the phone i have before. Pictures are clear and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working anymore after a year
customer_reviews.text: Update: phones lasted a year then broke. Lg screen keeps coming on but won't boot up. Ugh. They seem to be working good so far. But one of the backs was pulled up wrong for some reason and wasn't closing. Send to be repairing itself now though. However, the box was opened... Why? I don't know and I don't like it. New means you don't open the the right?? Weird. We'll see after a little while if my feelings chance.
customer_reviews.author: Laia Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom as an early Christmas gift since her phone wasn't working. She loves it! Brand new in the box with charger. Put in her T-Mobile sim card and was ready to go. Great price, fast shipping. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Screen failure, reseller is useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone as a refurb from Zeetron third party seller. The screen began to fail about 3 months in and is slowly dying. Doesn't register taps, and is showing ghosting of text. Further research show this phone has a lot of screen issues. Third party seller refuses to help and of course LG doesn't support refurb phones. I did take a risk by buying a second hand phone, but I'm not happy that I basically paid $165 to rent the phone for 3 months. I do not recommend buying this phone second hand.
customer_reviews.author: Obnubilated

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase another LG phone again
customer_reviews.text: Every battery I've had has allowed the phone to last about 4 hours at most. The new battery I have takes 1/2 an hr to start accepting a charge. Before that 1/2 hr the battery simply states I need to plug the phone into a charger. Any time I get a message a notification at the bottom of the screen comes up telling me that the "mobile data is on" for roughly 5 minutes. That's very annoying. LG did a fantastic job losing a customer. What an awful phone from what was a good line.
customer_reviews.author: The00Walrus

customer_reviews.title: 2 months update.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of the phone but the battery life is very poor. A full battery lasts for two hours with little activity. The phone shots down on its own ( bootloop ) occasionally , it mostly happens when I am using the GPS. I am very disappointed and i feel I wasted my money .
customer_reviews.author: Amazee c

customer_reviews.title: LG 4 is a terrible phone. (I like the features of the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: LG 4 is a terrible phone. (I like the features of the phone but) It is known for a "Boot Looping Error". It should have been covered by warranty but the company pretty much does not recognize their responsibility and will not flash the operating system.... but will include it in repairs for $72, or a complete refurbish for $172. If you do that ... their warranty is 90 days.... I now have three of these sucker.... "Bricks".
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Boot loop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used and I too got the boot loop issue after 6 months, and there seems to be no fix for that, so I'll need to get a new phone. Up until then it was a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: AOD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone and value - does not come with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone and value - does not come with a SIM card. We were able to call T-Mobile and they sent us a free one right away.
customer_reviews.author: MCW

product_meta.title: LG G4 H811 4G LTE Smartphone, 16MP Camera, 32GB, Metallic Grey (T-Mobile)
product_meta.description: Everything about the LG G4 makes it a pleasure to see and hold. We crafted it from timeless materials and included an intuitive rear key. The gently contoured, ergonomic design not only looks good, it feels good too. With the LG G4 camera, we’ve enhanced speed and versatility in several significant ways. The f/1.8 low-light lens, Manual Mode, Optical Image Stabilization, Laser Autofocus, and high-res image sensors deliver improved resolution and sharpness to every image you’ll capture and share. The 5.5” IPS Quantum Display on the LG G4 produces accurate color in Quad HD, with impressive contrast ratios for the next level of detail. Everything you view springs to life with vivid, brilliant color reproduction, drawing you in like never before. It’s time smartphones were designed to keep up with their users, not the other way around. The new LG G4 has an available microSD slot¹ plus a removable 3,000 mAh battery and Qualcomm Snapdragon 808 processor with X10 LTE. That means you can choose how much storage you need and get endurance and lightning-quick processing to spare.
feature_bullets: Internal Memory: 32GB, 3GB RAM + microSD Slot Expandable up to 128GB

LG 16 Megapixel Camera (5312 x 2988 pixels) laser w/ Autofocus, optical image stabilization, LED Flash + Front-facing 8 Megapixel Camera, optical stabilization, HDR, stereo sound rec., Manual Modereo sound rec., Manual Mode
Android v5.1 (Lollipop), 1.8GHZ 64 bit Hexacore Processor, with X10 LTE
5.5-inch IPS LCD Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 3
This phone works with the T-Mobile network ONLY. T-Mobile SIM card required. GSM: 850,900,1800, 1900, UMTS: Band 2, 4 (Roaming Band: 1,5), LTE: Band 2,4,12 (Roaming Band: 3,5,7)
